item.title: How to Prevent Page Reloads in Laravel Inertia with Vue.js and PrimeVue
item.description: One common issue developers face when working with Laravel Inertia and Vue.js is page reloads when clicking links in the menu. This typically happens when the Inertia <Link> component is not used correctly. In this article, we’ll explore why this happens and how to fix it with a practical example. Why Do Page Reloads Happen? When using Inertia.js to build single-page applications (SPAs), the navigation should be smooth and seamless without full page reloads.
